Articles.Content:
Yet again using ORDA, I was able to get my Kerbal Living Station (KLS) into a 500m orbit around Kerbin. I have been working on this for a while now, trying to make it so it would not blow up on the launch pad and give me enough time to give it an orbit. (Using parts from Kosmos Space Station Parts Pack and H.O.M.E and a few other random mods)

Let me know what you think :3
